text: Nabiyow maaxaginnitoo? Sinni Baaxooy sinni Buxaaxik Rabi meesih usun maggo Alfitte Akkuk yewqeeh kude maray Yalli Raba kak iyyeeh inki Adda Rabey Tohuk lakal usuk yuynuwwe marih maaqenta (xaagu kinnuk), Diggah Yalli Sinaamah Abeh yan Niqmatal kaxxa muxxo ken Amol le Rabbi kinni, kinnih immay Sinaamak maggo mari Yalla le Niqmatal mafaatita
